topics.body:
This AfternoonSunny, with a high near 48. Windy, with a southwest wind 25 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph.
TonightShowers likely, mainly between 2am and 5am. Increasing clouds, with a low around 28. Strong and damaging winds, with a southwest wind 50 to 60 mph increasing to 60 to 70 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 100 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.
TuesdayScattered rain and snow showers before 7am, then a chance of snow showers between 7am and 8am. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 33. Very windy, with a west wind 50 to 55 mph, with gusts as high as 80 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.
Tuesday NightMostly clear, with a low around 19. Wind chill values as low as -3. Strong and damaging winds, with a northwest wind around 70 mph, with gusts as high as 90 mph.
WednesdaySunny, with a high near 31. Strong and damaging winds, with a northwest wind around 70 mph, with gusts as high as 90 mph.

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552bf10563687260c7ef0500#post_552bf10563687260c7ef0500
Plus it's Mamoru Hosoda. That dude has yet to make a movie that isn't good.
Our War Game.
Summer Wars.
Wolf Children
Hell he even worked on the sixth One Piece movie.

topics.body: guys
topics.author: 37e5b9d66361642500af5e00

topics.body: Seriously, I love Kiki's Delivery Service, Spirited Away, and My Neighbor Totoro as much as the next guy. But Hosoda is not only a fantastic writer and director, he's a really cool guy. And that alone puts him above Miyazaki. Seriously, Hayao Miyazaki is an asshole.
